website.title: MeetifyNow - Simple Meeting Scheduling Tool
website.description: MeetifyNow is a simple-to-use meeting scheduling tool that doesn't require logging in. The perfect solution for quick online scheduling!

home.headerText: MeetifyNow is a simple-to-use meeting scheduling tool that doesn't require logging in.
home.title: Meeting scheduling has never been easier!

fast.title: Fast and easy
fast.text: MeetifyNow is your way to schedule meetings quickly and easily! Create them in seconds. Our app is easy to use and will make organizing meetings a pleasure.

everyone.title: For everyone
everyone.text: Whether you're having a business meeting or a social gathering, use MeetifyNow and enjoy a fast, simple, and fun planning process!

time.title: Don't waste time logging in
time.text: With MeetifyNow, scheduling meetings becomes even easier - you can do it without logging in! Save valuable time and schedule your meetings in no time!

online.title: Select availability online
online.text: Our app allows you to select your availability for a meeting, even if you are only available remotely! Fully customize your meeting schedule to suit your needs.

flexibleHours.title: Custom Hours
flexibleHours.text: Don't be limited to standard time slots! MeetifyNow allows you to create meetings at any time, adapting to your individual schedule.
